column4: Does there exist a tool that enables me access to remote pc's command line vie web browser?
are you trying to get around blocked ports?
nope. Something is wrong with my server. On every restart ssh seems to be broken. So until i find yout what is wrong i need such a web terminal
when i find out what is wrong i can define it :)
well, what's the behavior you see?
is the server behind a router, and if so, is port 22 forwarded? does your ISP allow connections to low ports like 22?
yes thats all fine. Last time i did restart sshd again and then it worked again
oh wow. Now i can access again...but on port 22
damn this is strange i did add port 2222
port 22 is the standard ssh port
strange in sshd_config there is set Port 2222....
so i suppose something is wrong with this file. Last time there was a unrecoginzed char in it which seemed to cause trouble.
sudo invoke-rc.d openssh-server and check for erros in cosole output and logs
psilo2 this error above vomes when trying: sudo invoke-rc.d ssh restart
